movement_capabilities.GROUND: They can travel on foot or with common land-based mounts like horses.
movement_capabilities.FLYING: They can fly over obstacles and terrain that would impede ground travel.
movement_capabilities.SWIM: They can move through water tiles.
movement_capabilities.PHASING: They can move through solid objects as if they were not there.
movement_capabilities.PASS_WALL: A special ability to move directly through walls and barriers.
